game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Explore the long-abandoned temple and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost temple deep in the jungle, said to contain an ancient relic of great power. The village elder has tasked you with exploring the temple and retrieving the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the temple.
task.description: The temple is said to be hidden behind a waterfall. Look for a narrow path that leads to the falls.

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous traps within the temple.
task.description: The temple is said to be filled with deadly traps. Use your wits and reflexes to avoid them.
The artifact is said to be located in a chamber deep within the temple. Be cautious of any guards or traps that may be protecting it.
